---
name: Bug Bounty Report
about: Report a functional, logical, or UI flaw in this project.
title: '[BUG] - Brief Description'
labels: bug-bounty
---

## Bug Description
A clear and concise description of the bug or vulnerability discovered.

## Steps to Reproduce
1. Navigate to the specific URL or component.
2. Perform the action (e.g., Click the submit button).
3. Observe the unintended behavior.

## Expected Behavior
Describe what should have happened if the system was functioning correctly.

## Actual Behavior
Describe what actually happened (e.g., The application crashed, data was not saved, or the UI layout broke).

## Evidence
Paste screenshots, console logs, or code snippets that demonstrate the flaw.

## Hunter Information
* **Reporting Team Name:** [Enter Your Team Name]
